name: Elf
description: Created by the god Corellon, elves have pointed ears and lack facial and body hair. They live for around 750 years, and they don't sleep but instead enter a trance when they need to rest. An environment subtly transforms elves after they inhabit it for a millennium or more, granting them certain kinds of magic.

traits.Darkvision: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Elven Lineage.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Intelligence, Wisdom of Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait.

Fey Ancestry.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

Keen Senses.description: You have proficiency in the Insight, Perception, or Survival skill.

traits.Trance: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.
